reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress visually appealing, saying it looks more expensive than its price tag, and appreciate its flowy chiffon material and beautiful color. They describe it as flattering, with one customer noting the belt accentuates the waist, and one mentioning it can be worn casually with sandals or heels. The dress receives positive feedback for its comfort, fit, and quality. Opinions about sizing are mixed, w

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and comfortable!
items.body: Love the dress, the fit, the fabric, the style. Perfect selection for my high school reunion. Iâ€™m 5â€™5 and 135 lbs, in my sixties and a medium was perfect for me. I like my clothes to be roomy not tight. Wore it with high black suede boots. The only thing that I would have preferred was maybe an additional inch longer. Dress value looks more because of the details like gold buttons and itâ€™s lined. Fabric flows and print was beautiful. This is a dress you can dress up or wear causally with sandals or flats. Itâ€™s a standout!! Read more
items.author: Bea J.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Royal Blue Dress That Turns Heads!
items.body: Beautiful and Comfortable Dress â€“ Highly Recommend! Cons: â€¢ ðŸ”˜ The Belt: The belt isnâ€™t the best qualityâ€”it feels a bit flimsyâ€”but itâ€™s still usable and does the job if adjusted right. Overall: This dress is perfect for both casual and semi-dressy occasions. With its bold colors and comfortable fit, itâ€™s an easy favorite despite the minor belt issue. Iâ€™d definitely recommend it!! Read more
items.author: Meghan saline

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress buying all the prints
items.body: So cute! Arms are very comfy and flowing Belt slips a little but easy to adjust or just swap out for a more statement belt Nice length perfect for boots for fall but could easily wear with heels or sandals, great coverage, flattering especially for the price Read more
items.author: Jasoncmrn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dress is beautiful and I received lots of compliments
items.body: The dress is beautiful in color, quality seems to be good. It is longer the picture implies, I have long legs and it still comes to my knees. The only thing I really wish is that it wasn't so expensive. I have never paid $55.00 for a casual dress but overall I am happy with it. I would love a BOGO from them since there are a couple other colors I liked but can't afford at that price. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfortable and beautiful fit
items.body: Beautiful dress, nice fit and was perfect choice for my birthday party. I am petite but it still was a good length right at the knee, not too long. Size small, Iâ€™m 4â€™11 130lbs Read more
items.author: LMT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress for any occasion.
items.body: This dress was perfect for a wedding I attended. It is beautiful, the material is great- not too thin, not too heavy. It looks expensive and classy and I got a lot of compliments on it. You donâ€™t need any kind of slip because it has a layer of material that acts as one. I wore some cute cowboy boots with it but would look perfect with sandals, heels, short boots etc. It is well made and love everything about it! Worth the purchase for sure! Read more
items.author: laura quiroz

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Casual and cute
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I am 5â€™2â€ and weigh between 145-150lbs. I purchased a size medium but a size small would have fit better since the dress is so flowy. The fabric seems to be chiffon but I cannot confirm since the garment is missing the care label. I love the cute gold button detailing(first four buttons can be opened, the rest are faux. This trendy dress is lined in beige fabric and comes along with a matching belt. Its a cute modest knee length dress. No stretch. Read more
items.author: DEBB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars â­â­â­â­â­ Perfect Fall Dress!
items.body: Beautiful color, flattering fit, and great quality. The fabric is comfortable and looks more expensive than expected. I got tons of complimentsâ€”highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Brown, Redbrown, Pink, White, Purple, Royal Blue, Dark Blue, Leopard, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
